document.title: Hot Topic: 2002 IRS, Social Security and Medicare Tax Changes for Election Officials and Workers
document.abstract: One of the tax law changes in 2002 pertaining to the Social Security Administration deals with the taxable threshold for wages paid election officials and workers.

field.name: comments
field.value:
